esi-4wk.description: Evaporative Stress Index calculated over a 4-week period, providing early detection of short-term vegetation water stress and rapid onset drought conditions.
esi-4wk.title: ESI 4-Week

esi-12wk.description: Evaporative Stress Index calculated over a 12-week period, indicating longer-term vegetation water stress patterns and sustained drought conditions.
esi-12wk.title: ESI 12-Week
